categories: Category:Alliance to Restore the Republic repulsorcraft

nodes.text: The General Dodonna was the name of a USV-5 Modified Landspeeder owned by Hilbrun's family and crew. It was parked in the city of Mos Espa on Tatooine sometime after the Battle of Yavin in 0 BBY, during the time of the Galactic Civil War. Marked with Alliance symbols, the speeder was named after General Jan Dodonna of the Rebel Alliance. The speeder had a metallic blue color, with purple markings. Its doors were also welded shut.
